name: Super Furi Puzzles
description:
"Super Furi Puzzles" [/ b] [/ h2]
Is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.
Put pieces together in a logical way in order to arrive at the correct solution of the puzzle. In the game: [/ h2]

  • Cute art.
  • Pleasant theme design.
  • Music for every taste
  • Gallery with pictures from the completed levels.
  • Leaderboard.
  • Tips in the form of puzzle pieces numbering (can be turned on and off)
  • A large number of levels
  • Two modes 3x3 (for beginners) and 5x5 (for real pros) [/ list]
